comments.raw_text:
I accidentally wrote some code that clones a bound function.  This "works", but then asserts when you try to actually evaluate the clone and land in js::CallOrConstructBoundFunction with an |obj| that has the following properties:

(gdb) p obj->isFunction()
$18 = true
(gdb) p obj->isBoundFunction()
$19 = false
(gdb) p obj->getFunctionPrivate()->u.n.native
$20 = (Native) 0x101091d79 <js::CallOrConstructBoundFunction(JSContext*, unsigned int, js::Value*)>
